text: Atomic Rooster are a British rock band originally formed by members of The Crazy World of Arthur Brown, organist Vincent Crane and drummer Carl Palmer. They were popular in the early-mid-1970s and the early 1980s. The band went through radical style changes. Their best known singles were "Tomorrow Night" (UK No. 11) and "Devil's Answer" (UK No. 4), both in 1971. ==References== Category:British rock bands
title: Atomic Rooster
